CustomBehavior.UseWhen: (Me.IsAlive && !Me.Combat) && (HasItem(124550) || HasItem(124551) || HasItem(124552) || HasItem(124553) || HasItem(124554) || HasItem(124555) || HasItem(124556) || HasItem(124557) || HasItem(124558) || HasItem(124559) || HasItem(124560) || HasItem(124561) || HasItem(124562) || HasItem(128348))

CustomBehavior.Code: Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: Using Baleful tokens.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: Your gear seems to be strong enough. We won't take any precautions.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: Your gear looks to be a bit weak. We will use a more cautious farm method and avoid stronger mobs.");
RoutineManager.SetCapabilityState(CapabilityFlags.MultiMobPull, CapabilityState.Disallowed);
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: Checking Parvink for dailies.");

Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: Parvink doesn't seem to be offering a quest at the moment.");
